author: nishant0
content:
hey currently I am testing out v0.12 in Prysm with gossipsub v1.1 . I have been looking to run it with  peer scoring so as to utilize with the extended validators. However in order to run peer scoring there are quite a few fixed parameters to define with regards to it. https://github.com/libp2p/specs/blob/master/pubsub/gossipsub/gossipsub-v1.1.md#peer-scoring 
The spec doesn't specify anything regarding it, wanted to know what is the plan currently for it. Will this be left to individual clients separately to decide on the params, or will we come to a common parameter values to use in the future after more simulation/testing ?
